message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and am interested in purchasing it. However, I would like to propose a price of $130.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell it to you for $135.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I've considered my budget and I'm able to offer $132 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'll sell the product to you for $136.
